summary: SweetSteps: a dark, chocolate-themed habit-building app featuring a “Why SweetSteps” carousel and other onboarding UI.
known_issues: Text gets cut off in the selected inner card in the 'Why SweetSteps' carousel (needs height/spacing adjustment)

existing_features.title: In the “Why SweetSteps?” modal carousel on the Landing page, increase the rendered height of the specific selected element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]) so that the feature description text is not cut off. Apply the change ONLY to the element corresponding to that XPath (e.g., by adjusting that element’s Tailwind height/min-height/padding/overflow behavior) and do not modify surrounding carousel layout/styling beyond what is strictly necessary.

new_feature_requests.summary: Increase height of the selected inner card in the 'Why SweetSteps' carousel so text is not cut off
